import { Router } from '@angular/router'; import { UsuarioService } from './../../autenticacao/usuario/usuario.service'; import { Component } from '@angular/core'; @Component({ selector: 'app-cabecalho', templateUrl: './cabecalho.component.html', styleUrls: ['./cabecalho.component.css'] }) export class CabecalhoComponent { user$ = this.usuarioService.retornaUsuario(); constructor( private usuarioService: UsuarioService, private router: Router ){} logout(){ this.usuarioService.logout(); this.router.navigate(['']); } }
